scripts.imdb: dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold 'Data Source=./imdb.db' Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite -o ImdbContext
scripts.update-controller: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator controller -name MyDatabaseController -dc vue_dotnet.MyDbContext.MyTableContext -m vue_dotnet.MyDbContext.MyTable -async -api -outDir Controllers -f -sqlite
scripts.update-page: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator razorpage -m vue_dotnet.MyDbContext.MyTable -dc vue_dotnet.MyDbContext.MyTableContext -udl -outDir Pages/MyDatabase --referenceScriptLibraries -sqlite
